text_block_list.text:
The weekend was finally here. I'd taken care of 
all the work that had piled up and was getting 
ready to start training in the afternoonâ€¦â€¦
(Thud-ud-ud-ud-ud-ud!!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Buueeeenos taardeeeeees!! 
Feeling good, Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's right, El's always feeling good! 
On-track or off-track, I perform in top fooorm!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hn? â€¦â€¦Trainer, you look a little tired. 
We haven't started yet, you know!?
choice_data_list: Fatigue's been catching up with meâ€¦

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
QuÃ©!? Why!? How!? The sun's shining 
right above! It's too early to fizzle out!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No, no! We're aiming for the world here! 
How can we do that without energy!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Â¡Hala, find the strength in your core! Take a breath! 
Fill your lungs with fresh air!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Â¡Vamos, Trainer! We're going to run!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeah!! When I feel good, I'm always running! 
So running makes you happy!! Let's goooo!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Â¡Uno dos tres! Raise your thighs more!! Follow El's lead! A-one, and a-two!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's it! Keep it up! Now get ready to take off with meee!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Shout oouut! Jump uuup! Ignite your fightiing spiriiiit! 
Â¡Â¡Â¡OlÃ©, 10 more tiiiimes!!!
â€¦â€¦ Led by El Condor Pasa, I ran laps around the training track.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Bueno!! Now that's El's trainer! 
You look good when you're fired up!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Especially on that last lap, I felt your burning passion! 
Great job, you get a flower mark!ðŸ’®

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nah-ha-ha-ha! You're welcome! We sure worked up a good sweat! Another day of great trainingâ€¦

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hmm? Training?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Trainer! We haven't done any actual training yet!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Hurry up, ring the gong at full speed! 
It's training tiiiâ€”
(Diing-doong-daang-doong)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: QuÃ©!? That's the bellâ€¦â€¦!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Aahï½ž This week was so tiring! Hey, wanna drop by the convenience store?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Sounds good, I want some sweets and just chill for the dayï½ž

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Whaâ€” Whawhawhaâ€¦â€¦ Everyone's leavingâ€¦â€¦ 
This can't beâ€¦ It's time to go home alreadyâ€¦?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Does that mean our training is overâ€¦â€¦?
choice_data_list: I'll hang out with you a while longer.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Trainerâ€¦â€¦!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Woooh, El's a lucky girl! I'm so happy you're my trainer!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's pull ourselves together and go train! We're going to 
chase that sunset to the riverbankâ€¦ no, to the ocean!
choice_data_list: â€¦â€¦ Let's keep it reasonable, yeah?
â€¦â€¦ Let's keep it reasonable, yeah?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeaah. I get it so let's gooo!
Training with El Condor Pasa was fun, but very exhaustingâ€¦

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What are you waiting for, Trainer! I'm gonna leave you behiiind!
